hero_desc: We maintain a transparent, merit-based admissions process for both O-Level (S.1) and A-Level (S.5) students. Applications are processed in the order received, subject to class availability.
procedure_subtitle: A structured, predictable journey from inquiry to enrollment.
requirements_subtitle: Ensuring transparency in the verification process for every applicant.
eligibility_li1: Students must have successfully completed the lower level of education (Primary 7 for S.1, S.4 for S.5).
eligibility_li2: Transfer students are subject to a performance review and interview with the academic department.
eligibility_li3: All applicants must be accompanied by a parent or legal guardian during the interview phase.
